content:
Please generate a random artifact card for a treasure hunt adventure. Attributes to populate:

Artifact Name: The name of the valuable item.
Origin: The civilization or individual who created it.
Material: What the artifact is made of.
Power: Any magical or extraordinary abilities the artifact has.
Location: Where the artifact is currently believed to be.

Artifact Name: The Starheart Amulet

Origin: Crafted by the ancient elven civilization of Llyrania, said to be a gift from the stars themselves.

Material: The amulet is primarily made of a rare, luminescent crystal known as starstone, embedded in a setting of platinum and adorned with small diamonds that seem to twinkle like distant stars.

Power: It is believed to possess the power to grant its bearer visions of the future and to protect them from harm under the light of the full moon. Some legends suggest it can also teleport the wearer to a safe location once per lunar cycle.

Location: Currently believed to be hidden within the Whispering Caves, a series of underground tunnels and chambers deep within the mystical Forest of Eternity, guarded by ancient enchantments and elusive forest creatures.
